name: Splat! (itch) (Andrew Spinks)
description:
Hey Mates!

This is a small side project that I worked on before major production during year 1 of my course.

It is a puzzle game featuring a rotating paint canvas and colour blending. The player must match the pattern shown on the preview in order to pass the puzzle.

NOTE: This game will ONLY work on 1920x1080 res. This is because of how I setup the preview canvas.

Thank you for checking out this small side project of mine, and hope you enjoy!

I am always looking to improve, C&C is welcome even though It is extremely unlikely that I will ever return to this project.

Cheers Mates!
